Description: Aggregates all nodes without power injection (positive or negative, i.e. demand or generation) to electrically closest ones

Values: Str in the format ‘carrier1+carrier2+...+carrierN-X’, where CarrierI can be from {‘solar’, ‘onwind’, ‘offwind’, ‘ror’} and X is one of {‘cap’, ‘time’}.
List of Str like [ 'solar', 'onwind'] or empy list []
Description: List of carriers which will not be aggregated. If empty, all carriers will be aggregated.
Controls whether radial parts of the network should be recursively aggregated. Defaults to true.
Controls whether radial parts of the network should be recursively aggregated across borders. Defaults to true.
Isolated buses are being discarded if bus mean power is below the specified threshold.
Isolated buses are being merged into a single isolated bus if bus mean power is above the specified threshold.

Values: Str in the format ‘carrier1+carrier2+...+carrierN-X’, where CarrierI can be from {‘solar’, ‘onwind’, ‘offwind’, ‘ror’} and X is one of {‘cap’, ‘time’}.
List of Str like [ 'solar', 'onwind'] or empy list []
Description: List of carriers which will not be aggregated. If empty, all carriers will be aggregated.

Values: "False" use Voronoi shapes,  "True" use GADM shapes as aggregation zones
distribute nodes per country according to ['load'], ['pop'] meaning population or ['gdp']
when true logging is printed to console
{key} can be any of the component of the generator (str). It’s value can be any that can be converted to pandas.Series using getattr(). For example one of {min, max, sum}.
Description: Aggregates the component according to the given strategy. For example, if sum, then all values within each cluster are summed to represent the new generator.

Values: {key} can be any of the component of the bus (str). It’s value can be any that can be converted to pandas.Series using getattr(). For example one of {min, max, sum}.
Description: Aggregates the component according to the given strategy. For example, if sum, then all values within each cluster are summed to represent the new bus.
